Name: Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies
Steps: First you have to cook your bacon until it's crispy.
Pour bacon grease it into a glass container and allow to cool completely until it solidifies.
Heat oven to 375 F. In a large mixing bowl combine butter bacon fat and sugars. Cream until fluffy.
Add eggs and baking soda. Mix well.
Mix until flour is mostly incorporated.
Stir in bacon and chocolate chips.
Drop by rounded scoops onto a parchment lined baking sheet.
Bake at 375 F for about 8 minutes. Allow to cool for a few minutes on the sheet.
